title: The Perfect Aryan Male wears black
author: VD
content_html: Or he will be for the next month, anyhow. It seems Fox News is reporting that Anna Nicole Smith died today. It’s a pity, but not exactly a shock. Physical attractiveness, psychiatric problems and drugs just don’t seem to be the ideal recipe for a long and happy life.
content_text: Or he will be for the next month, anyhow.  It seems Fox News is reporting that Anna Nicole Smith died today.  It’s a pity, but not exactly a shock.  Physical attractiveness, psychiatric problems and drugs just don’t seem to be the ideal recipe for a long and happy life.
